title: Patch 6.20 keep disconnecting from the server
body: I've been playing LOL for about 1 year now. Like never before it start disconnect from the server when game starts on load screen. Usually if this happen I restart my PC faster and reconnect. But now it's worse, game load 100% and force close. This happened to me on few ranked games also. Please fix.

replies.body: When it force closes, are there any error messages?  I want to make sure that what we're looking at here is a connection issue, and not game related that fail to render properly.  Let me know with any additional information you can provide!
